channel.title: Items Needing Requirments
channel.description: Ok well over my 1-2 months of coding,i've become a pretty decent coder...i've been adding,removing,and fixing things on my server,and LEARNING ALOT from reading tut's and figuring things out on my own,i just recently took notice to some items on my server,people can wear like fighter torsos,rune defenders ect..without the stats to wear them...probably a REALLY stupid question to be asking but,i was wondering if anyone could tell me how to change/add stat requirments for items,any help would be greatly appericated.

item.title: Items Needing Requirments
item.dc:creator: @knova knova
item.description:
@knova wrote:

sreach in your client for clattack
in tehre there are either itemid == ###
or
itemname.startswith(name name name)

return 10;

(return 10), is your lvl requirement.

Read full topic
